description: @cache decorator changed from no-argument form to requiring ttl parameter, breaking functions using old @cache syntax
expected_fix: Update all @cache decorators to @cache(ttl=...) in services/data_service.py, services/api_service.py, and utils/helpers.py
optimal_fix: Add ttl argument to all @cache decorators: (1) services/data_service.py: 3 decorators, (2) services/api_service.py: 2 decorators, (3) utils/helpers.py: 4 decorators. Change @cache to @cache(ttl=3600) or appropriate TTL value
